bibl.title: Wadi Sarga at the British Museum: Sources for Study (with Annotated Bibliography).

Coptic Society, Literature and Religion from Late Antiquity to Modern Times. Proceedings of the Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012 and Plenary Reports of the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. I; - II

bibl.note: The sites. - Distribution of objects. - Excavation documentation. - Unfinished book manuscript. - Field notebooks (AES Ar. 712). - Photographic prints and negatives. - Map and plans (AES Ar. 1313-21). - Tracing of wall-paintings (AES Ar. 1267-69, 1271-1312). - Watercolours (AES Ar. 1261-66). - Unpublished manuscript (AES Ar. 722). - Correspondence (AES Ar. 712). - Evidence of earlier work. - Conclusion. - Pp. 1554-1557: Annotated bibliography by subject and date.
bibl.seg: Elisabeth R. O'Connell, Wadi Sarga at the British Museum: Sources for Study (with Annotated Bibliography).

Paola Buzi, Alberto Camplani & Federico Contardi (edd.), Coptic Society, Literature and Religion from Late Antiquity to Modern Times. Proceedings of the Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012 and Plenary Reports of the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. II = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 247 (Leuven - Paris - Bristol, CT, 2016) pp. 1547-1564, 11 figg.

The sites. - Distribution of objects. - Excavation documentation. - Unfinished book manuscript. - Field notebooks (AES Ar. 712). - Photographic prints and negatives. - Map and plans (AES Ar. 1313-21). - Tracing of wall-paintings (AES Ar. 1267-69, 1271-1312). - Watercolours (AES Ar. 1261-66). - Unpublished manuscript (AES Ar. 722). - Correspondence (AES Ar. 712). - Evidence of earlier work. - Conclusion. - Pp. 1554-1557: Annotated bibliography by subject and date.
